prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a ninja with blue skin and a scarf.
Imagine a frog-like creature with sharp features and a stealthy appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that can blend into its environment with a sleek design.
Generate a fighter with aquatic abilities who is known for its speed and agility.
Design a ninja-inspired Pokemon that has a unique way of using water in battles.
Make a Pokemon that has both ninja skills and elemental water powers.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies stealth and is adept at camouflage.
